name: Lawnmower Game: Find Trump
description:
STORY:


Lawnmower guy is back. Now you drive in open world. Collect items to get achievements and main mission is to find ex leader Trump to finish game
Lawnmower game: Find Trump is an relaxing open world driving simulator where you drive in open world where is lot of grass, trees, buildings, water, and mysterious objects. Lawnmower Game: Find Trump lenght is approximately 1-2 hours long. So can you best lawnmower driver and find all secret items and also the biggest guy Trump

FEATURES:

- Open world
- Lot of achievements
- Find Trump to finish game

DISCLAIMER

This game is a work of fiction. Names, characters, places and events are the products of the authors’ imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
